What's the difference between Monster Magic and just Magic? Other than Mosters use it.
Monsters mostly use sorcery while mages use magic
sorcery is an innate connection and use of magic while wizards use magic through study and learning
a most unfortunate recoloring, if hoping for camouflage

so sorcery is often a bit random - you can have one monster that just throws fire and lighting and another that cant seem to throw fire at all- yet can bend the will of humans or turn people into animals
while wizards can do whatever they eventually learn how to do- with the more advanced stuff being much harder and complicated
Nekomata magic is highly associated with body enhancement/modification and illusions - and can also have some offensive abilities- usually fire
would there be certain monsters that use magic more like a wizard?
some monsters have been able to become wizards
Tengu often have natural magical abilities- but also learn like wizards
usually they specialize in Wind and Illusions
